MarkusPfundstein/mcp-obsidian

MCP server for interacting with Obsidian notes through the local REST API

View on index

Related repos

  • run obsidian in docker and access notes from your browser
  • AI assistant for Obsidian notes with chat, summaries, and smart linking
  • standard for turning APIs into MCP servers, plus open registry for LLM tools
  • Publishes notes from Obsidian to the web
  • Connector allowing Claude Desktop to read Obsidian vaults
  • Integrates ChatGPT and local LLMs into Obsidian
  • AI-powered writing in Obsidian with contextual chat and seamless note integration
  • Curated list of Obsidian plugins, themes, and tools
  • Saves web pages to Obsidian as Markdown
  • Run and watch your own MCP servers locally with OAuth2 and a live dashboard
